definitions.definition: To fly high with little effort, like a bird.
To mount upward on wings, or as on wings.
To remain aloft by means of a glider or other unpowered aircraft.
To rise, especially rapidly or unusually high.
definitions.example: The pump prices soared into new heights as the strike continued.

definitions.definition: To rise in thought, spirits, or imagination; to be exalted in mood.
